name: Marblescape
description:
Marblescape!

2 different modes:

Levels: Use your mouse to choose where the ball should start, press the spacebar when you are ready! Try to get your marble into the checkpoint!

Sandbox: Place new blocks, springs and checkpoints. Use the spacebar to activate/deactivate camera control. Control the camera with your mouse. Move objects using the arrow keys, scale using S and W, and rotate the blocks/spring using A and D.  Edit an object using the paintbrush, save using the tick and delete using the 'x'.

A premade level:
